Swara (Notes) () is a 2023 Sri Lankan Sinhala adult medical drama film directed by Sanjaya Nirmal and co-produced by Nita Fernando, Chandran Ratnam, Manohan Nanayakkara and Rohan Welivita. It film star ensemble cast where Nita Fernando and Sachini Ayendra in lead roles along with Anusha Rajapakse, Kanchana Kodithuwakku and Nadeeka Gunasekara in supportive roles. Music composed by Ranga Dassanayake.
Plot
The film based on AIDS patient Narmadha, who is a renowned musician but struggle in the life. In the meantime, she has to face various conflicts and the relationships with the seven different characters: Justin, Padma, Vihara, Nimanthi, Joe, Rohan and Anjali.
